Posts.Content: Hi All, I have my appointment tomorrow and will see my oncologist for the first time. I am estrogen sensitive her2 positive. I had my dx at the end of march, surgery 13/4 and cavity shaving on 31/5.  I keep trying to start a list of questions but dont seem to get anywhere. Anybody else in a similar position who can give me any advice would be greatly appreciated.  Thanks, Mini
Posts.Title: Questions to ask oncologist tomorrow
